short_summary: Request for Supply Arrangement for heavy trucks and related items
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the supply of heavy trucks and related items.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
====================================

**Tender Details**
------------------

* **Title:** Truck, Tractor, Heavy; **仞s:** Tracteur routier, lourd
* **Reference Number:** cb-4936-94932631; **Number of Amendments:** 1
* **Solicitation Number:** W8476-226577/B
* **Publication Date:** April 25, 2023; **Tender Closing Date:** May 17, 2023 (14:00:00)
* **Modification Date:** May 17, 2023

**Supply Arrangement**
---------------------

* **Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA):** E60HP-16TRUK
* **Category:** Group 1, Configuration B
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive, Selective Tendering
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

**Delivery and Procurement**
---------------------------

* **Regions of Opportunity:** Global
* **Regions of Delivery:** Canada
* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)

**Notice of Proposed Procurement**
----------------------------------

The Department of National Defence is looking for a supplier to provide (7) truck, tractor, heavy and related items under Supply Arrangement E60HP-16TRUK Group 1, configuration B.

The solicitation process is open only to suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request (RFSA) E60HP-16TRUK. Suppliers interested in becoming pre-qualified can refer to the following link: https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notice/PW-HP-539-73419.

**Request for Documents**
-------------------------

* **Language of Submission:** English or French
* **Submission Period:** Fifteen (15) calendar days
* **Deliveries:** Must be made on or before 120 days after contract award

**Contact Information**
-----------------------

Victor Shepstone, Contract Authority
